items.sentence: Mary makes tea the way she's always done: without teabags. The tea goes straight into the pot.
I'd planned to do it that way, but I changed my mind after Tom suggested doing it another way.
Tom didn't want to major in French, but his parents said they thought it would be a good idea.
I realize this may sound crazy, but I think that I've fallen in love with your younger sister.
I wonder why I can read and understand French much easier than I can understand spoken French.
